title: Urine testing of people with HIV for tuberculosis can save lives and be cost-effective

title_detail.value: Urine testing of people with HIV for tuberculosis can save lives and be cost-effective

summary: Screening all hospitalized patients with HIV for tuberculosis using urine tests would improve life expectancy and be cost-effective in Malawi and South Africa, reports an international team of investigators.

summary_detail.value: Screening all hospitalized patients with HIV for tuberculosis using urine tests would improve life expectancy and be cost-effective in Malawi and South Africa, reports an international team of investigators.
